channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Hadoop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Hadoop

item.title: CVE-2016-3086|2024-09-16T17:13:54.507Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20hadoop
item.description: The YARN NodeManager in Apache Hadoop 2.6.x before 2.6.5 and 2.7.x before 2.7.3 can leak the password for credential store provider used by the NodeManager to YARN Applications.
